channel.title: VPS cfg Problem , please HELP
channel.description:
hello all i using VPs With Debian 5.0 OS . When i trying tu run server with [code]sh run.sh[/code] command i getting this error
[code]npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. globaldrops.cfg: file not found. doors.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found.
[/code]
This all cfg are in need place i ccheked that all my files are on /root/server/
who can fix my source i will attach it .
srry for my english this is not my default language
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?gklgjmwitkcqkra]http://www.mediafire.com/?gklgjmwitkcqkra[/url]

item.title: VPS cfg Problem , please HELP
item.dc:creator: @IrcdScape IrcdScape
item.description:
@IrcdScape wrote:

ok,i have this problem found,you use linuxâ€¦so the slash is / , windows have the slash ,so all in handler,like npchandler is with \config\npc.cfg or something,change to this slash : /

i hope it helped,it helped by my!

greeting,rocky

Read full topic
